question: When should a nonfunctioning adrenal tumor be operated -
exp: Ans. is 'd' i. e., 4 cm. Adrenal incidentalomaso Patients with functional tumors or obviously malignant lesions should undergo adrenolectomyo For non-functional tumors -Size < 3 cm -- 6/12 monthly CT/MRI follow up. Size 3 -5 cm -- Adrenalectomy in fit patient. Size >5 cm -- Adrenalectomy.

question: Parathyroid adenoma most commonly involves which of the following sites:--
exp: Ans 'c' i. e. inferior parathyroid lobe. Parathyroid adenomas most commonly involves the inferior parathyroid glands.
